Exposure settings - printing but prints breaking free of supports
Bottom exposure - if prints arnt sticking

In a moment
I think of the way
Mum used to 
tend to us kids in
the mighty cold.

We were naughty
no-gooders,
yet Mum knew our
boyish hearts.

Mud splattered
wares littered the
wash basket.

Mum's buried over
there on top of Dad;
cheers to you both.
